explanation: The objects that may be involved in completing this task are the Pen and the Mug. The Pen needs to be placed inside the Mug on the nightstand and then both the Mug and the Pen need to be moved onto the desk. Another Mug with a Pen inside it needs to be placed in front of the white Pen on the desk. Finally, the Pen needs to be placed in the black Mug and both the Mug and the Pen need to be placed on the desk.
